name: NO PLANET B_TRANSMISSION 001
description: MISSION 001: B_001 // Long ago, we looked to the stars to find our second home. We sent out drones, Valkyries, to scour the edges of the universe. Finally, they've begun transmitting their data back to us. But so far, the Valkyrie transmissions have only drawn more attention to what we already have... ‍// ‍This rare collection of elusive Planet Bee NFTs remind us to take care of the precious ecosystems, biodiversity and health of Planet A —our home— Earth. //// Lovingly designed and coded by one human, architect, and multidisciplinary artist, @HirangaG. Each Planet Bee transmission is a unique, 1 of 1, animated artwork; meticulously crafted with procedurally unique features, in a unique universe! By purchasing, collecting (hodl!!), trading and joining the No Planet B NFT community, you are supporting real bees and a real mission to reviving our precious ecosystems, here on Earth. //// There is #noplanetB [ https://www.earthli.world/noplanetb ]
